channel.title: Trrying to get a shop to work
channel.description: how do i make it so when you talk to an npc it opens up a shop? Im trying to make a shop with king roald who doesnt have a trade option. how would i go about doing this, the easiest way possible.

item.title: Trrying to get a shop to work
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

For text over a NPC’s head… (at least this is how I do it)

Open “NPCHandler.java”

Find:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (Misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

ABOVE that add:
(replace “NPC ID FOR U” with the ID of the NPC who will shout, and “TALK FOR U” with what you want the npc to shout)

//NPC CHAT ABOVE HEAD
						if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID FOR U) {
						if (Misc.random(100) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "TALK FOR U";
						}
					}

The comment is just so I can ctrl+f the code for finding the code quick.

If you search, you will find it. You just have to know what to enter and search for. It takes awhile, but trust me, you can find something eventually…

Read full topic
item.source: Trrying to get a shop to work

item.title: Trrying to get a shop to work
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

you would need to do it like this:

if(NPCID == KING ROALDS ID HERE!!!!) {
NpcDialogue = 100;
NpcDialogueSend = true;
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 45;
}

and you would need to make a case 100 looking like this…

			case 99:
				talk("Hello "+playerName+", wanna see my shop?", 1835);
				break;
			case 100:
				choice("Yes.", "No.");
				break;

Read full topic

item.source: Trrying to get a shop to work

item.title: Trrying to get a shop to work
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

search for in client.java:

wanneshop

and with all of those, add this

if(NPCID == KING ROALDS ID HERE!!!!) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; }

and then in shops.cfg make a shop 45 with w.e u want in it… save compile… and when u click on him, it will open the interface.

Read full topic
